meanings.definition: The state or quality of being alien or foreign.
meanings.sent1: Her alienabilities made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship's crew had unique alienabilities that fascinated the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The alienabilities of the new student sparked curiosity among her classmates.
meanings.sent4: His alienabilities in understanding different cultures were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The alienabilities of the extraterrestrial creature were beyond human comprehension.

meanings.definition: The ability to possess characteristics or qualities that are different or unfamiliar.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's alienabilities allowed him to see in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The alien's strange alienabilities amazed the researchers.
meanings.sent3: His alienabilities in playing the piano were unexpected but impressive.
meanings.sent4: The artist's alienabilities in creating unique sculptures were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The alien's alienabilities to communicate telepathically were astonishing to witness.

meanings.definition: The capacity to adapt or adjust to unfamiliar or new situations.
meanings.sent1: Her alienabilities helped her navigate the foreign city with ease.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's alienabilities to survive in extreme conditions were unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The robot's alienabilities to learn new tasks quickly were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The team's alienabilities to work together harmoniously were crucial for their success.
meanings.sent5: The alien's alienabilities to blend in seamlessly with humans were truly remarkable.
